snippet: An aide to former President Ali Abdullah Saleh said Thursday that Mr. Saleh’s security team had uncovered a plot to kill Mr. Saleh with explosives.
abstract: Aide to former Yemeni Pres Ali Abdullah Saleh says Saleh's security team uncovered plot to kill him with explosives planted in tunnel running to mosque inside his residential compound in Sana.
lead_paragraph: An aide to former President Ali Abdullah Saleh said Thursday that Mr. Saleh’s security team had uncovered a plot to kill Mr. Saleh with explosives.
